languages.text: "Я рада, что вы меня понимаете. Я была призвана! Значит, это было мое дело, и только мое".

traits.locale_text: "Я рада, что вы меня понимаете. Я была призвана! Значит, это было мое дело, и только мое".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."
languages.original_text: "Я рада, что вы меня понимаете. Я была призвана! Значит, это было мое дело, и только мое".

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我很高兴你能理解我。我受到了召唤！因此，那就是我的使命，只属于我。”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你能理解我。我受到了召唤！因此，那就是我的使命，只属于我。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Me alegro de que me entienda. ¡Había sido llamada! Por eso mismo, era asunto mío y solo mío».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de que me entienda. ¡Había sido llamada! Por eso mismo, era asunto mío y solo mío».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我のことを理解していただけたことが嬉しい。我は呼ばれていたのです！そして、それは我の仕事であり、我だけのものだった」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: 「我のことを理解していただけたことが嬉しい。我は呼ばれていたのです！そして、それは我の仕事であり、我だけのものだった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr mich versteht. Ein Ruf hatte mich ereilt! Und daher war die Sache ganz allein meine Angelegenheit."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr mich versteht. Ein Ruf hatte mich ereilt! Und daher war die Sache ganz allein meine Angelegenheit."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis ravie que vous me compreniez. J'avais été appelée ! Ce qui signifie que cette mission ne concernait que moi. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravie que vous me compreniez. J'avais été appelée ! Ce qui signifie que cette mission ne concernait que moi. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Anlamana sevindim. Çağrılmıştım! Yani, bu mesele sadece ama sadece beni ilgilendiriyordu."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad that you understand me. I had been called! And thus it was my business and mine alone."

traits.locale_text: "Anlamana sevindim. Çağrılmıştım! Yani, bu mesele sadece ama sadece beni ilgilendiriyordu."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
